thread.title: Best Computer Memory 2017 - Top-Rated DDR4 RAM Kits
thread.title_full: Best Computer Memory 2017 - Top-Rated DDR4 RAM Kits

author: Thomas Soderstrom
title: Best Computer Memory 2017 - Top-Rated DDR4 RAM Kits
text: Two included cooling fans that reduce both motherboard and DRAM temperatures Cons Included fans add to the total price Verdict Corsair's CMK16GX4M4B3200C16 quad-channel memory kit puts up solid performance numbers, but its "good value" applies only to builders who want or need the included fans. Besides cooling the modules, included fans could be even more practical in builds that don't have a fan over the CPU.
